work_experience.responsibilities: Provides strategic HR counsel, evaluates HR practices, partners with Plant HR Manager for disability processing, relocation coordination, and performance tracking. Manages employee relations, talent management, recruitment, labor relations, and safety performance. Administers benefits and compensation programs and manages HRIS systems.

Created effective filing systems, managed payroll processing, data entry, budget support, and reconciliation. Conducted research, processed confidential correspondence, and arranged meetings and events. Improved administrative procedures and established new information systems.

Served as first point of contact for HR inquiries, managed terminations, benefits, and leave processing. Ensured compliance with HR regulations and implemented training programs that improved efficiency and reduced rework. Recognized for cost reduction and performance excellence.

Maintained employee records, managed benefits, recruitment, and staff training. Developed employee recognition programs and implemented efficient administrative systems. Improved retention and reduced turnover through training and professional development initiatives.

awards.name: Employee of the Month Award
awards.description: Recognized multiple times for outstanding performance, compliance, and customer satisfaction improvements.
